entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
